attributes.action: Before its too late, gun crime and gang warfare in London
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: for those of us who live in areas such as South East london we are all aware of the increase in Gun crime and gang culture. it is already out of control as those from these areas will know, something needs to be done before its too late, before any more people loose their lives and its too late to turn back, lets put a stop to it!

rejection.details: Please redraft the main sentence to give an explicit action for HM Government.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
